name: Applet Farm
description:
Hello and welcome to my indie game:

Applet Farm

This game is a simple little farming game about a 3*3 grid of "farmcubes", the window size is intentionally small so that you can have it running in the corner of your screen. It's designed to be engaging in the first few minutes and then be left idle while you wait for it to grow and develop.

To play you must dig up plants with the Shovel tool, to then switch to the seeds tool to plant new ones, every now and then you will encounter a rock that you must break with a pickaxe.

This is only the start of this game, I will definetly do more work on it when I have the time to and donating will definetly help but only do that if this is something that you are suffering to see updated, Thank you for at least checking out the webpage!

The tools available:

Tool:
Use:
ShovelDigging up plants / searching for rocks in the dirt.
PickaxeBreaking rocks that you find.SeedsFor planting new crops to then harvest.

The tools still being worked on:

Tool:Use:Watering can
Will increase the amount of time the crop takes to grow but will give more money after it has grown.

Current Key Binds:

Up arrow
Selects the next FarmCube
Down arrow
Selects the previous FarmCubeLeft mouse / Z
This will use the tool on the currently highlighted block.Middle mouse / X
This will cycle the selected tool forward.Right mouse / C
This will cycle the selected tool backward.R
Switches the camera projection style between Orthographic and Perspective
Holding S and pressing enter
This will save the game into a file called "appletfarm.save", overwriting the last save.Holding L, O and pressing enter
This will load the save from "appletfarm.save" and also make a back up save in "appletfarm_backup.save" incase you didn't mean to save.

This game is only around 1 mb in size and thus is easy to download and east to keep on the hard drive. It uses no textures and is very very light on performance.
